rows.label: tlk00230103_msg0001
rows.name:
Don't lose heart... For a mercenary,
death is a constant companion.

rows.label: tlk00230103_msg0002
tlk00230103_msg0003
rows.name:
But Ion is different... She
is shaken by this sudden
loss, and grieving deeply.

rows.label: tlk00230103_msg0004
rows.name:
Her sorrow is not likely
to heal for some time...
